game.name: Mashed
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Compete over 13 challenging and diverse environments using whatever means necessary to batter and bruise your opponents into submission, and claim victory for yourself!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Compete over 13 challenging and diverse environments using whatever means necessary to batter and bruise your opponents into submission, and claim victory for yourself!
